comment.author: 79334698@N00
comment._content: www.smithsonianmag.com/history-archaeology/pietown.html?c... Great article with the history of Pie Town inspired by these photographs.

comment.author: 29753838@N00
comment._content: Wow, I love this photograph.  The text "Pie Town" on the roof of the General Store, the dirt road and the cafe; the way the family walks along the road spread out, I see an equality in that.  I like it that the father is carrying the baby and has not left that responsibility to his wife.  I like this "Pie Town" series.  The color photography is nice.
